Blog.post: now at my cousin huse...my older cousin now doin hw den the younger de havin tuition...si bei sian...softball oready gt shirt liaoz...buttden mine still wit yuu...haiz...duno how it looks lyk...sure veri nice de...si bei sian...=> listenin to sum songs of my cousin...duno wad the hell ish tat..all rock de...

im now lyk so bored...wondering wat to do...2dae sux...its lyk piano lesson is so boring cuz im doin theory...i luv practical...now so sian...duno wad to do...listening to a few of my fav. songs n rotting infront of my com...

its been veri long since i wrote here liaoz...these few daes were lyk not so boring liaoz...went to catch 2 movie wit my god mum n my god sis...in the theater...my lil god sis jux could not keep still...lyk she gt worms in her freakin butt...summore she so noisy...lucky tat movie ws the 1st show so didnt hav mani ppl...so malu...go out wit a pri 2 lil gerl...

haiz...2dae was lyk everi other dae...BORING...all i can remember is tat i was watching tv the whole dae...slept awhile...den continue to watch tv again...haiz...Y MUS HAV HOLIDAY?!?!!?!?!?! holidaes aren't the same without my cousin...she's trapped at home cuz of her PLSE...haiz...HELP ME PLEASE!!!!!!!!! i going to rot at home liaoz...VEGETATE N ROT...shit man... *siGniNg ofF...5.38pm*

if u reali love sum1 but the sum1 in return does not giv a damn about it...4get it man...life's not over yet...u can reali find sum1 betta or sum1 hu loves u more den he or she does... i didnt noe i could gif such advice...im lyk so sian ryte now...this is totally real n totally uncool...it sucks... ~signing off at 10.52pm~
holidaes r sho sho boring...there's nothing to do except homewrk if ur at hme...go out oso sian...at home oso sian...HOW!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!

wah piang...2dae gt 2.4...si bei tiring man...the 2b1 mly boi duno wad name keep calling me when i run...sick boi sia...if i not wrong he is hafiz bahx...aniwaes passed my 2.4!!!! sho happi...i tot i wld fail...after running legs still abit lyk jelly...hahahaha...aniwaes 2dae veri tiring...going to slp earli liaoz...nites ppl~ *yawn*

haiz...tat tym gty 2b1 ppl call me fadilah cuz i look lyk her...now more n more mly bois call me fadilah...aniwaes...found out a few new things at sch 2dae...a few gerls tld me bout it...found it veri surprising...haiz...2dae gt nafa 5 stations...actually quite eazy lohz...write till here bahz...hope cn get gold in nafa...tired liaoz...tml den write summore...having aches at the waist...haiz...*yawn*

2dae after sch so sian...gt go the english supp...whle class tio sia...poor us...after den i get to go for softball tranin man...was late for lyk half hour lohz...so little sec 1 sey...onli gt 4...onli me, daph, wan yee n cai ning...si bei boring...1st do the base running thing den later all the softball bois all come in sia...suppose they bat we run den bcum they bat they run...all the seniors havin fun while we sec 1 all kena watch...si bei sian man 2dae traning...nxt tranin coming up on wednesdae...hope not so sian when coach comes on wednesdae...~~i reali reali reali reali love softball~~ helps me to feel better after bad things happens... ~softball owaes~
i feel so dumb...y does it turn out to be lidtat...i tot it wld be different this time...but u proved me wrong...im so gone frm my usual self...

lurve oso so difficult...seems nth is easy at all...aniwaes...thx for all the ppl hu has been surporting me all the wae when i needed help...thx lynette n naqiah...beSt frEnS foR evAz...luRvE u guYs...

todae sho tiring sia...gt piano frm morning till afternoon den later in afternoon gt dance practise sia...sho tired...saw mani ppl at tymzone oso...didnt noe so mani ppl noe me sia...lolx...saw billy tat dae sia...he si bei tall man...so yandao sia...mIsS biLLy... SiGn oFf~~
y mus lidtat...when i jus start to lyk sum1 den he lyk other ppl liaoz...is it my fault...i feel so lost...so sad n dissapointed...

actually...billy ish not a bad guy afterall...veri caring n cute...jus duno why jas wld sae those things to me bout billy...was he tat bad???? aniwaes everibodi has a different mindset lohz...mayb wad i saw was the positive side of billy...n i hope to see that foreva...is tat asking too much???

2nite again hav to slp veri late in the morning...but there's sth different...gt nobodi pei me till nxt morning...how?!?!?!!?! billy chu...where the hell r u...i need sum1 to pei me till nxt morning...but how to find???

y mus be lidtat...i dun feel lyk thinking ryte now...2.23am shld b slping...but instead go do the sickening compo n talking wit billy...actually he veri gt liaoz lohz...pei me dun slp do hw...dun tink cn find ppl lidtat...dun slp oso can...haiz...find myself veri xing fu yet veri cham...~conFusEd~

wah piang...so sian man...at her huse gt bbq...den later use her freaking com den cnnt oso...the com tio virus...summore so mani...found 1 liaox den later gt summore...keep causing her com to shutdown...use onli make the high blood pressure go up up up...lol...so angri wit the freaking com man...
